item.title: SqlPackage - The Element or Annotation class SqlStatistic does not contain the Property class AutoDrop
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving SqlPackage SqlStatistic AutoDrop property errors when importing BACPAC files in D365 Finance Operations using d365fo.tools.
